keyPolicies.policyDescription: Getting a Brexit deal that works for the Potteries and holding the Tories to account.

issues.brexitEurope: Getting a Brexit deal that works for the Potteries and holding the Tories to account.
issues.health: The NHS will last as long as there are folk left with the faith to fight for it.
issues.socialWelfare: They [Conservatives] simply don't care about disabled people, as they hide the true extent and their policies are pushing lives at risk as our NHS falters and even our schools are now being starved of funding.

leaflet.personalStatement: Gareth was elected on a promise of standing up for Stoke-on-Trent, getting a Brexit deal that works for the Potteries and holding the Tories to account.

contactInformation.address: Hillcrest House, Garth Street, Stoke-on-Trent, ST1 2AB

quotes.text: The NHS will last as long as there are folk left with the faith to fight for it.

images.caption: Gareth Snell with supporters, emphasizing local and proud commitment.
